title: It seems as though champion-select chat has been synced. Can anyone confirm this?
body: Has rito really heard my cries {{champion:432}}

replies.body:
Hasn't heard ur cries, i mean come on, if u think about it, it's OUR cries :P
{{summoner:31}}

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rjb95E1F,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-17T04:21:33.024+0000)
>
> Hasn't heard ur cries, i mean come on, if u think about it, it's OUR cries :P
> {{summoner:31}}

But I cried the loudest... And thrive on narcissism. :D

Actually I made a thread less than a week before they announced the update, specifically talking about the chat being inconsistent and not even anything like trolling or feeding that comes after. Then it appeared on the patch notes that chat would be more consistent.
NICE HOLY OH MY GOD THANKYOU. SORRY FOR BEING THAT PERSON WHO DOESN'T RESEARCH FIRST BUT OH MY GOD THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING

According to the 5.13 patch notes, it was one of the bugfixes:
> Rapid-fire chat messages now always appear in the same order for everyone in a lobby or chat room
Decreased chat message latency. This isn't really a bug but it's related to our last point

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-513-notes#patch-bugfixes
